title: The Do's and Dont's in Open Relationships
itunes:title: The Do's and Dont's in Open Relationships
description:
1/11/19 - Today on the show we had our favorite political pundit Angela Rye, stop by where she gave us the tea about the "Government Shut Down". Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to yet another Floridian and this time it was because a teacher smeared feces at park, disrupting child's birthday party after workplace dispute. Moreover, its Freaky Freaky Friday so we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners participated in a open relationship after Ronnie and Shamari discussed their pros cons of exploring it themselves. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
1/11/19 - Today on the show we had our favorite political pundit Angela Rye, stop by where she gave us the tea about the "Government Shut Down". Also, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to yet another Floridian and this time it was because a teacher smeared feces at park, disrupting child's birthday party after workplace dispute. Moreover, its Freaky Freaky Friday so we opened up the phone lines to see if any of our listeners participated in a open relationship after Ronnie and Shamari discussed their pros cons of exploring it themselves.
